sections.name: Installation
sections.body:
``foobar`` requires Python 3.4 or higher.  Just use `pip
<https://pip.pypa.io>`_ for Python 3 (You have pip, right?) to install
``foobar`` and its dependencies::

    python3 -m pip install foobar
